text:
In the top 25 most words used by Finance Minister Arun Jaitley in his budget speech, “government”, “tax”, “propose”, “provide”, “sector”, “expenditure”, “scheme”, “income”, and “financial” feature prominently.

The Finance Minister spoke for about 95 minutes.

Why is the budget presented on the last day of February every year? So that the Lok Sabha has a month to review and recommend changes to it.
title: Beyond the hard numbers
